author: costin
msg: The entries in the scoreboard will be presented as beans. A bit hacky, but

author: remm
msg: - Properly restore path after failing to map welcome files.

author: remm
msg: - Log register/unregister contexts and wrappers as debug.

author: costin
msg: A bit of refactoring for common methods ( the itoa and map concat ).
The really interesting one is adding getters and setters to the endpoint ( to abstract
the info from scoreboard ), I'm working on it.
I split the status page in 4 - the config info doesn't change, there is no
need to display it all the time, and the scoreboard page can grow and is the
really interesting one from performance perspective.
